data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Golestan, Iran to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Golestan, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Golestan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Golestan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Golestan, Iran to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turkmen people.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Golestan, Iran.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Golestan, Iran into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Golestan, Iran.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Golestan
location.cities_list: Gorgān, Gonbad-e Kāvūs, Dāmghān, Āzādshahr, Kalāleh
location.cities_list_w_pop: Gorgān (244,937), Gonbad-e Kāvūs (131,416), Dāmghān (67,694), Āzādshahr (47,590), Kalāleh (33,700)
